    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101363</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How it's Made: Bread</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie er gebildet wird: Brot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment il est fait : Pain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como é feito: Pão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come è fatto: Pane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς γίνεται: Ψωμί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo se hace: Pan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Where does bread come from? See the makings of bread as a staple of the western diet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Woher kommt Brot? Sehen Sie die 
Voraussetzungen des Brotes als Heftklammer der westlichen Diät.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'où est-ce que le pain vient ? Voyez les 
qualités du pain comme agrafe du régime occidental.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">De onde o pão vem? Veja os makings do pão 
como um grampo da dieta ocidental.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da dove il pane viene? Veda i makings di 
pane come graffetta della dieta occidentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πού το ψωμί προέρχεται από; Δείτε τις
κατασκευές του ψωμιού ως βάση της δυτικής διατροφής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿De dónde el pan viene? Vea los makings del
pan como grapa de la dieta occidental.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
